Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.spaceinvaders.game.inputcontroller

Class AInputController

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.spaceinvaders.game.inputcontroller.AInputController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInput
Direct Known Subclasses:
KeyboardInputController
public abstract class AInputController extends Object implements IInput
Een abstracte classen die de input controller samen bundelt.
